targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days';
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;
SELECT ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (updated_at - created_at))/3600), 2) AS avg_resolution_hours FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved' AND created_at >= now() - interval '30 days';
SELECT priority, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY priority ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT CASE WHEN status = 'Resolved' THEN 'Closed' ELSE 'Open' END AS state, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= now() - interval '30 days' GROUP BY state;
